NAEB SCRIPT EXCHANGE
I.
Contributed by
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN TELEVISION
and
UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF SPEECH
W. S. GILBERT*S
M CREATURES OF IMPULSE11
Adapted for Television by
MARTHA DE LANO
(As broadcast on the University of Michigan TV Series,
Down Storybook Lane, March ll*, 1953, 2;00 - 2:30 p.m.,
overTHe facilities of Station WWJ-TV, Detroit)
Distributed by the NAEB through the courtesy of University
of Michigan Television and by arrangement with the Willis
Music Company of Cincinnati, owners of the copyright*
NOTE: This television adaptation is based on the published
version of Creatures of Impulse which was edited and
set bo music by Edward Stasheff and Donald K. Phillips,
published by the Willis Music Company of Cincinnati.
It may be used for classroom or laboratory productions
without further permission. It may be broadcast over
educational stations or by educational institutions
using the facilities of commercial stations for non¬
commercial telecasts, by payment of a $5*00 royalty to
the Willis Music Company, 12k East Fourth Street, Cin¬
cinnati 1, Ohio* Permission to present it under other
than educational auspices must be secured from Mr. John
Cranley at the above address.
